name: Blocky Pro Skater Boy Extreme
description:
Block Skater brings all the fun of skateboarding to your phone!
Jump on your pixel board and own the street while you perform all kind of tricks in this freestyle skateboarding game.

Become a pro skater and compete against your friends to be the best skater ever!
If you love skateboarding games and pixel art, this amazing free game is just for you!

Skate through the pixel streets and try to be the best skater in the global leaderboards. Performing ollies and tricks is more fun than ever!

Streets are full of obstacles you should dodge, jump or grind. Go as fast as you can and collect all the gold coins while you land some ollies.
Use power-ups to cheat death and don't crash. Use coins to upgrade the power-ups.

Collect all the funny characters in the store! Amazing blocky pixel graphics!

* Dash and dodge as fast as you can!
* Swipe to do tricks, ollies, board grabs and more!
* Online leaderboards and achievements!
* Cool skater pixelated characters!

Skateboarding games has never been so fun!
